fr.ups.djapi

Class DJAPIConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ups.djapi.DJAPIConfiguration

  • public final class DJAPIConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration Singleton used to set up a connection to the database specified in the configuration file.
    The default configuration file path is described by CONFIGURATION_FILE_PATH

    Note: : The configuration file will be automatically generated with the default values if it does not exist on the server.
